required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dilapan-S / Dilasoft E-Registry in Induced Abortion
clinical_study.official_title: International Observational E-Registry on the Use of Dilapan-S/Dilasoft Osmotic Dilators for Cervical Priming Prior to Induced Abortion

brief_summary.textblock: International Observational E-Registry on the use of osmotic dilators DILAPAN-S® / DILASOFT® for cervical priming prior to induced abortion.

detailed_description.textblock: International, multicentre, non-interventional, observational e-registry, post market clinical follow up study to document current clinical use of Dilapan-S or Dilasoft for cervical priming before induced abortion with regard to the number of dilators used, duration of insertion of dilators in situ and unusual complications consequent of their use.

primary_outcome.time_frame: max. up to 24 hrs; estimated average 6 hrs

primary_outcome.measure: Total time taken for cervical priming with Dilapan-S/Dilasoft
primary_outcome.time_frame: max. up to 24 hrs; estimated average 6 hrs
primary_outcome.description: Duration of leaving osmotic dilators in situ

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of synthetic osmotic dilator used
secondary_outcome.time_frame: max. up to 24 hrs; estimated average 6 hrs
up to 24 hrs; estimated average 6 hrs
secondary_outcome.description: pre-operative bleeding, fever, pain, nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, premature passage of foetal or chorionic tissue

secondary_outcome.measure: Other observed undesirable effects uf use of synthetic osmotic dilators
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hrs; estimated average 6 hrs
up to 10 minutes after osmotic dilators extraction
secondary_outcome.description: In cases, when surgical abortion is performed

secondary_outcome.time_frame: estimated max. up to 10 min, estimated average 8 min.
secondary_outcome.description: Period from speculum insertion in to speculum extraction out

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hrs; estimated average 48 hrs

secondary_outcome.measure: Complications related to induced abortion procedure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hrs; estimated average 12 hrs

secondary_outcome.measure: Infectious complication and its relation to the use of Dilapan-S/Dilasoft
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hrs; Complications, if any, will be followed-up until stable situation has been reached.

intervention.description: Synthetic osmotic dilators Dilapan-S or Dilasoft for cervical priming prior to induced abortion

study_pop.textblock: All patients indicated for cervical priming with Dilapan-S or Dilasoft prior to induced abortion and meet all inclusion and exclusion criteria in centres involved in data collection.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Intrauterine pregnancy ≥ 6 and ≤ 24 weeks gestation
- Patients who are capable of giving consent and sign the form
- Abortion being made in compliance with the Abortion Act 1967 (For England, Wales and Scotland)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinical signs of uterine, vaginal or vulvar infection
- Acute bleeding

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Care for Mother and Child, Prague, CZ
Research Center for Obstetrics, Gynecology and Perinatology, Moscow
Allentown Women´s Center, Bethlehem, PA, US
Choices Women´s Medical Center, New York
